articles.author: Anish Anand
articles.title: AFC CL playoff: Mumbai City overcome Jamshedpur, return to Asian elite - ESPN India
articles.description: Mumbai City FC will represent India in the 2023-24 AFC Champions League group stage.

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Mukesh Ambani regains Asia's richest person spot: Forbes - Economic Times
articles.description: Despite declining demand for Covid-19 vaccines, India's vaccine king Cyrus Poonawalla -- whose portfolio includes listed financial services firm Poonawalla Fincorp as well as privately held vaccine giant Serum Institute of India -- held onto his spot as the c…
articles.content: Mukesh Ambani has regained his spot as Asia's richest person after rival Gautam Adani tumbled to No. 24, Forbes said in its Billionaire 2023 list released on Tuesday. "Adani was the world's third-ric… [+4743 chars]

articles.author: Jon Porter
articles.title: OnePlus' new Nord includes a 108-megapixel camera and 67W fast charging - The Verge
articles.description: The OnePlus Nord CE 3 Lite cots €329 (£299) and will go on sale on April 20th in select markets across Europe and Asia but not the US. It offers 67W fast charging and has a main camera with a resolution of 108 megapixels.
